creator: CreativeApp Technology
descriptionHtml:
If the bibliophile in you is unable to find the hardcopies of your favourite books, don’t ignore the Free Ebook Downloader.

It is a must-have book downloading app for every avid reader out there. Here, you can choose from a wide variety of free books to download and read.

Free Ebook Downloader lets you download various e-books, PDF files, novels, educational books, etc. for free and read them on the go with the help of its inbuilt reader.

It is a highly recommended app all over the world, with most number of downloads in India, Philippine, US, Australia, Nigeria, Kenya, and other countries in Africa.

Free Ebook Downloader is a feature-packed app. The various features include:
Free e-books downloader
E-reader
Inbuilt library
Access to public library
Personal library
Search system
Auto suggest search
Night mode
Offline reader
Epub reader
PDF reader
Free PPT presentation
Free Doc files
Speaker notes
Audio Epub files

All these features make Free Ebook Downloader a fun and an easy-to-use app. Let us give you an insight of some of these lovely features of the app.

To begin with, it comes with an inbuilt library and search system. You can either search your favourite bestselling e-books or download them from the inbuilt library of the app.

The extraordinary library contains over 30,000+ books on most common topics. It is an all-embracing hand library which comes with a hassle-free browsing experience.

Free Ebook Downloader lets you explore the fascinating world of books and stories and allows you to access the public library contents. It is a storehouse of millions of awe-inspiring pieces of literature and some of the best storylines ever.

It consists of free books on a wide and varied range of genres like Romance, Ghost & Horror, Biography, Suspense & Thrillers, Mystery, Travel, Cooking, Science & Technology, Comedy, Politics, Women, Health, Children, Classic tales, etc.

Apart from this, you can also find Comics, Technical e-books, Training e-books, Dev e-books, Programming e-books, Education e-books, books on Computer networking, Technology books, books on Technical lessons, Political Stories, etc.

Apart from accessing the public library, you can also create your own personal library on the app. You can download and save as many free books and documents as you want and create your own personal library customisable to suit your mood and taste.

Free Ebook Downloader is not just an ordinary reading app which is just used for reading a PDF or an Epub file. It also connects you with the best writers and story readers from around the world, and also allows multiple free downloading of books.

With the search system of this app, you can easily search for the greatest e-books of your choice from different sources. It also has an auto suggested search system, which recommends similar books to you based on your taste and search pattern.

Moreover, you won’t have to go through the struggle of finding the books all over again, every time you open the app. You just need to search the name of the books and your past search results will be shown to you.

The most loved feature of this app is that it has Night Mode for reading books. The Night Mode feature automatically dims the brightness of the screen to such an extent that it decreases the strain on your eyes.

Thus, you can enjoy reading books and other features of this app, anytime you want to. This feature also improves the battery life of your device.
descriptionShort: Download Any Book PDF and Ebook files, Novel, Education Book with Inbuilt Reader
